creditline: Gift of Mrs. A. Boyd Thomes
description: Full length garment with front overflap closing to the right, fastened with five gilt metal ball-and-loop toggle buttons, tapered sleeves ending in flared cuffs, slit front and back.  Decoration Body the celestial landscape, (nine gold lung dragons, clouds, mountains, waves with eight treasures and li-shui pattern) with a scattered scheme of bats and the attributes of the Eight Taoist immortals, all patterned with multi-colored plied-cord silk and gold metal wrapped thread tapestry against a blue ground, designs enhanced with painted pigments; Borders neckband and cuffs with imperial imagery of dragons, clouds, and waves with ju-i scepters, all patterned with multicolored plied-cord silk and gold metal-wrapped threads against a dark blue ground, trimmed with black silk and gold metallic brocade ribbon with a swastika fret pattern; sleeve extensions black 7.1 satin; lining blue silk tabby.
title: Male Child's Semi-formal Court Robe (chi-fu)
